subtitleNullable: TFRecords of the images from "Cassava Leaf Disease Classification" by classes
descriptionNullable:
`21397` JPG image files `center cropped` and converted into `15` TFRecords with `256x256` resolution.
Dataset source JPG files: https://www.kaggle.com/c/cassava-leaf-disease-classification/data
Discussion thread about the data: https://www.kaggle.com/c/cassava-leaf-disease-classification/discussion/198744
Example notebook used to convert the JPG files to TFRecords: https://www.kaggle.com/dimitreoliveira/cassava-leaf-disease-stratified-tfrecords-256x256

### TFRecords with Image data
The train TFRecords have the following feature map

```
feature = {
        'image': _bytes_feature, 
        'target': _int64_feature, 
        'image_name': _bytes_feature, 
}
```

`image_name` is the title of the image extracted from the `image_id` column from `train.csv`

target feature map
```
0: Cassava Bacterial Blight (CBB)
1: Cassava Brown Streak Disease (CBSD)
2: Cassava Green Mottle (CGM)
3: Cassava Mosaic Disease (CMD)
4: Healthy
```
title: Cassava Leaf Disease TFRecords external 256x256
